segments.text: From my view, the upper cabinets are wide open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar inside, stuffed with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, arm extended to snag some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the stool's leaning way backâ€” that's risky!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall right onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's beside him, hand up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is kind of charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over at the sink, water's running endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing, flooding the basin and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's polishing that plate, unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's getting drenched from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful scene is turning into a nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks the indoor turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a difference between in and out.
segments.speaker: PAR
